TEXT.TITLE: ENVIROPACT <VIRO> IN NASDAQ NATIONAL EXPANSION
TEXT.BODY: Enviropact Inc said its stock has been included for listing in the National Association of Securities Dealers' NASDAQ National Market System effective March 17. Reuter
